amendment.description: Amendment increases the Army Corps of Engineers Construction Account for Louisiana Coastal Restoration by $10 million and reduces the Department of Energy Administration Account by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the Army Corps of Engineers Construction Account for Louisiana Coastal Restoration by $10 million and reduce the Department of Energy Administration Account by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Scalise amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 216 - 177 (Roll no. 306).
